name: DIVINE (REorenji)
description:
A top down shooter with a retro vibe and a great soundtrack.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

The portal to the underworld was opened, and demons took over the world.

Many had fought and died searching for "THE DIVINE"...

The only thing capable of closing the portal to save the world.

Unable to be completely broken, "THE DIVINE" was separated into nine pieces, and scattered around the world.

Brave souls keep fighting and searching for "THE DIVINE".
